task.title: Creating a new condition
task.shortdesc: Only conditions that were found in the topic are shown in the sidebar. You can create and apply new ones to your topic.

context.p: When applying a condition to text, you can choose from conditions that already exist in your topic. You can also create new conditions if you want to.

step.cmd: Open the conditions sidebar from the Toolbox.
Click on APPLY CONDITIONS to reveal the panel which allows you to apply and remove conditions.
Select a condition name from the drop down list.
Type a value for this condition name in the box below.

info.note: You may not include white space in the value of a condition.

result.p: The new condition will be added to available choices under Select Conditions, and the new condition will have a color assigned to it in the legend below.
